PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-03552024-04-18
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of SYLVAIN VILLIARD of Laval, Québec, to be interim Chairperson of the board of directors of The Jacques-Cartier and Champlain Bridges Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of SYLVAIN VILLIARD of Laval, Québec, to be interim Chairperson of the board of directors of The Jacques-Cartier and Champlain Bridges Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
